Hi,

  I've been installing and looking into all possible programs listed
a=
t http://www.junit.org/news/extension/index.htm all afternoon, still
I can'=
t find any standalone program, allowing to just choose, run and
watch the r=
esults of test in a shiny graphical GUI AND supporting 
JUnit4.0.

  What I=
'm looking for is not a IDE-plugin and I know they do the
task. I need a st=
andalone framework which would allow my project
menager to run the tests hi=
mself, not having an IDE supporting JUnit.
Something like NUnit provides.

=
  Any ideas?
